title: Educational Impact Evaluation Framework Development: Elementary Mathematics Teaching Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of mathematics instructional methods
context.additional_context: Enhancing the capacity of practicing elementary school teachers to develop assessment systems for measuring the effectiveness of mathematics education.

learning_goals: Acquire the ability to design three or more evaluation metrics for measuring educational program effectiveness.
Develop a plan to apply an evaluation framework tailored to educational levels (elementary school/lifelong learning).
Execute two or more data collection methods (e.g., eye-tracking) for analyzing learning outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
